artist: Artist: Kawase Hasui; Publisher: Kawaguchi Jirō; Carver: Maeda Kentarō; Printer: Komatsu Wasankichi
inscription: bottom margin: 昭和四年八月作 {Shōwa yonen hachigatsu saku} (made in August 1929)
markings: LLC. red round artist\'s seal: 川セ {Kawase} | LL margin publisher\'s seal: カワグチ {Kawaguchi} | LR margin: 彫前田摺小松　版権所有 {hori Maeda suri Komatsu, hanken shoyū} (carved by Maeda, printed by Komatsu, copyright)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text:
The original Benten Pond that belonged to Zōjō Temple does not exist anymore in its size. All that remains is a small pond at the southeast of Tokyo Tower in what is now Shiba Park.
second edition published by Kawaguchi alone
title: Benten Pond at Shiba
